Welcome 
 This is {Shop_Type}. 
<select>
I'm here to buy
I'm here to sell
Stop
<select_end><break>
Come back anytime! \n<turn_end>
You're here to buy some.\n Which one do you want?\n<break>
Would you like to buy something else?\n<break>
Oh, it looks like you don't \n have enough money to buy that.\n<bw_break>
Well, that's a shame.\n<br_break>
Thank you very much!\n<br_break>

This is also 
 effective when used as a 
 tool in battle. 
<bw_break>

{Item_Selected_Name}. 
 {Item_Costs} gold, 
 would you like to buy this? 
<yesno><break>

No one seems to be able to 
 equip the {Item_Selected_Name}. 
 Would you like to put it in the bag? 
<yesno><break>
Would you like to \n equip {Item_Selected_Name} now?\n<yesno><break>
Then I'll \n put it in my bag.\n<bw_break>

Oh, it looks like {Character_Selected_Name} can't 
 equip 
 {Item_Selected_Name}.

 equipped with

 keep what I was looking for in my storage bag.

Equipment

I need to get it again \n to register again, but can I sell it? \n *My code will not be deleted. <yesno2><break>

Oh? Dear customer,

<yesno><break>
